segments.text: We have another traditional holiday-the Dragon Boat Festival .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It falls on the fifth day of the fifth lunar month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me the origin of the two festivals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . The Dragon Boat Festival is a way to commemorate a great ancient poet named Quyuan . On that day , people will hold a boat race as a symbol of the attempt to save him who threw himself into the river .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do people eat rice cakes on that day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In order to prevent the fish from eating the poet's body .
segments.speaker: S1
